title: Shafali Verma's Explosive Innings Left Meg Lanning Speechless: WPL 2023 Highlights
content:
The Women's Premier League (WPL) 2023 witnessed an incredible display of power hitting by Shafali Verma, leaving even her captain Meg Lanning in awe. In a one-sided match against Gujarat Giants, Verma smashed 76 runs off just 28 balls, including 10 fours and five sixes, guiding Delhi Capitals to a dominant victory.

Lanning, known for her calm demeanor, was visibly excited by Verma's onslaught, admitting she "didn't see that coming."  Verma's innings showcased her exceptional talent and fearless approach, making it one of the most memorable T20 knocks by an Indian batter in recent times.

This performance highlighted Verma's potential and her ability to dominate the WPL. Her innings was a testament to the power-hitting prowess of young Indian talent and her ability to leave even experienced players like Lanning speechless.
author: Vinayakk Mohanarangan
